p.text: Objects (buttons, windows, images) are blocks which are used for creation of any program.

textAll.p: Objects can register user's actions (which are called events), such as click, moving of a mouse on some object, changing of a text and so on. To set registering of any action use Events tab.

Objects can be set in a way you need by using a great number of properties. Besides, you can change properties while the program is functioning by setting the algorithm in Actions tab. These algorithms which change properties are programming.
